name: SixtySecondWorkout
0:
”Alexa, open sixty second workout”
”Alexa, start sixty second workout”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sixty second workout
Developer Terms of Use
des:
If you've got a minute to spare, then you've got time for a Sixty Second Workout!

Alexa will choose a random workout for you to do for 60 seconds. You can do as many 60 second workouts as you want! 5 minute workout? No problem! 30 minute workout? Sure! Some example workouts include: bicycle crunches, sit-ups, push-ups, burpees, squats, crunches, lunges, and more!

Currently supports 25 different types of workouts and 12 different motivational messages to keep you going! Alexa will also keep track of your progress and let you know how many workouts you've completed (or skipped) by the time you're done!

"Alexa, open Sixty Second Workout"
This opens the skill and starts your workout! Alexa will ask if you're ready to begin, after that, you can speak any of the following commands to Alexa:

"Alexa, Start"
Speak this command and Alexa will pick a random workout for you to do (that you haven't completed yet).

"Alexa, Skip"
Speak this command and Alexa will skip the current workout and choose another random one for you to do (that you haven't completed yet).

"Alexa, Status"
Speak this command and Alexa will tell you how many workouts you've completed so far as well as how many you've skipped!

"Alexa, Stop"
Speak this command and Alexa will provide you with a final progress update and then close the skill. Say "Alexa, open Sixty Second Workout" to open the skill again.

Show and Share the Love
If you love this skill, please give us a favorable review and/or share it with your friends! If you have an idea on how this skill could be improved for you, please let us know! We're actively engaging with our users to build the best skills on Alexa!

Future Enhancements (see http://sixtysecondworkout.com for more details):
- Enhancing your workouts with pictures 
- Adventure Mode (gamify your workout by slaying a dragon, opening a secret door, or traveling to a new land!)
- Kids Mode (make getting healthy a fun activity for the whole family!)
- Oldies Mode (let's face it, you're not getting any younger! This mode will come with low-impact exercises that you can do no matter your age!)
- Support for multiple languages (soon to support 7 different languages)

Check out http://sixtysecondworkout.com for more details.

Thank you!

Sincerely,
Jason Stiles
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
